data.exclude: Hosts (comma seperated) not to include in Nmap scanning.
data.home_interval: The number of minutes Nmap will not scan this device, assuming it is home, in order to preserve the device battery.
data.hosts: The network address (comma seperated) to scan.
data.scan_options: Raw configurable scan options for Nmap.

user.description: Configure hosts to be scanned by Nmap. Network address and excludes can be IP Addresses (192.168.1.1), IP Networks (192.168.0.0/24) or IP Ranges (192.168.1.0-32).
